data.title: Munich mayor extends Oktoberfest invite to US President Barack Obama -- The outgoing US president has said he would like to visit Germany's famed beer festival as a private citizen. Now, the mayor of Munich has welcomed him to do just that
German parliament legalises cannabis for medical consumption
Drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman has been extradited from Mexico to the United States, foreign ministry says

India dismisses Trump impact on climate targets: India’s energy minister says the new US government will have no impact on his country’s renewable power plans, with investors queuing up to support new wind and solar projects.
Norway on Thursday said it will raise $400 million to encourage Brazil's farmers to stop destroying the rainforests, launching a fund also backed by food giants Unilever and Nestle.
Plane carrying Brazil Supreme Court judge crashes into sea
'Many dead' in avalanche on Italy hotel
30 firefighters killed after collapse of landmark high rise building in Tehran
Obama’s Final Arms-Export Tally More than Doubles Bush’s.
China builds world's biggest solar farm in journey to become green superpower
Syrian refugee sues Facebook over 'fake news' posts accusing him of terrorism after Merkel selfie
New Zealand plans to ban cosmetic products containing tiny plastic particles known as microbeads from July next year because of the risk they pose to aquatic and marine environments.
Indonesia's 'horrific' Bandung Zoo remains open as new animal cruelty evidence released, showing emaciated bears begging tourists for food
Norway unveils $400-million fund to tackle deforestation
